name: Salt lick Global 6 kg
description: Salt lick Global 6 kg is mineral feed as a lick for cattle, sheep and goats and is very well absorbed. For ratios with a balanced Ca:P ratio (2:1). The global licking compound provides the animals with additional minerals, vitamins and trace elements. Economical, strong, weatherproof! Without molasses = 100% minerals, does not attract flies. It is waterproof. Product is swiss made.
